Episodes.Title: White People Renovating Houses
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Randy comes to grips with what it means to be white in today's society.

Episodes.Title: Put It Down
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Tweek freaks out over bomb threats from North Korea; Cartman threatens to kill himself unless he gets respect.

Episodes.Title: Holiday Special
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Randy protests Columbus day, causing the town to cancel the holiday. The boys do everything they can to get beck their day off school.

Episodes.Title: Franchise Prequel
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Professor Chaos begins spreading lies about Coon and Friends on Facebook.

Episodes.Title: Hummels & Heroin
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Beloved entertainers are being cut down in their prime due to massive overdoses of opiates, and Stan is about to be exposed as the source.

Episodes.Title: Sons A Witches
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: At the annual Halloween get together, a witch casts a spell that terrorizes everyone.

Episodes.Title: Doubling Down
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Kyle is playing with fire when he gets in the middle of Cartman and Heidi's relationship.

Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy and Timmy's experiment could nab them first prize in the annual science fair.

Episodes.Title: Super Hard PCness
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Jessica Makinson
Episodes.Plot: PC Principal falls in love with the new Vice Principal; Kyle isn't impressed with Terrance and Phillips' new Netflix show.
